item.description:
Due to the forecast for snow on Saturday, Feb 5,

That Meet Up is cancelled.

I am rescheduling this

Meet Up for March 13.

We can meet in front of Walden Bookstore that is at the top of the
Escalator from the Food Court.

http://local.yahoo.co...

local.yahoo.com/info-10606994-waldenbooks-trumbull

http://www.google.com...

www.google.com/search?hl=en&source=hp&q=waldenbooks+trumbull+ct&aq=0&oq=Waldenbooks%2C+tr&aqi=g1

We can walk around the Mall.

http://westfield.com/...

westfield.com/trumbull/

We can have a cup of coffee at some point during our
Travels within the Mall.

Please remember to rate the event if you attend.

If there is bad weather, then this Meet Up will be cancelled.

I know that those of you off of I – 91 think that this is too far for you to go,
So you do not need to RSVP No and say that it is too far.
Most of you East of Milford & New Haven will say the same.
Do not fill my e-mail with these RSVP No or I will delete them from
my in box and from the event.
Some of you think that an event is too far unless it is around the
Block from your home or work.

Mike B.

Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: I will contact those who RSVP Yes or Maybe up to 24 hrs before the event..
item.why: Westfield Trumbull Mall has a food court, restaurants and various stores to visit. We can walk around inside the Mall or find some place to seat to discuss current events.
item.name: Coffee Talk Visits the Westfield Trumbull Mall
